generalSituation: An upper-air disturbance will bring showers to the northern part of the South China Sea in the next couple of days. Under the influence of an anticyclone aloft, the weather will be brighter over southern China over the weekend and early next week. Meanwhile, the broad area of low pressure over the central part of the South China Sea will bring unsettled weather to the region. The northeast monsoon will arrive at the coast of Guangdong early next week. It will be windier over the region.
